statements: UPDATE email_segments SET segment_name = 'New Segment Name', demographics_filter = 'New Demographics Filter' WHERE segment_id = 1;

UPDATE email_segments SET demographics_filter = 'age > 25 AND gender = 'female'' WHERE segment_id = 2;
UPDATE email_subscribers SET engagement_level = 2 WHERE subscriber_id = 101;
UPDATE subscriber_segments SET criteria = '{"age":30}' WHERE segment_id = 1;

UPDATE subscriber_segments SET criteria = '{"region": "North America", "subscribed": true}' WHERE segment_id = 1;
